description: Single storey rear extension; external alterations
decision_conditions:
<p><span style="line-height: 107%;">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning
(General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and
re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s)
shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby
permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning
authority.</span><br></p>
<p>The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.<br></p>
